title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1501.6 - Manually operated alarm
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1501.6 - Manually operated alarm

State Regulations
A new fire detecting system shall be equipped with at least
one manual fire alarm box located in a natural path of escape, to provide an
auxiliary means for actuating the alarm system. Where practicable such box
shall be located on the ground floor near the main means of
egress. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1501.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
